Luxury Hollywood View Apartments
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 694 Sq.
Ft.
Welcome to Hollywood View Towers Luxury Apartments.
Our prime location places you at the epicenter of Hollywood!
Here you can dive into the local lifestyle with access to exclusive shopping, exquisite dining, and mind blowing entertainment.
Hollywood View Towers Luxury Apartments are just a five minute drive away from the world famous Hollywood Walk of Fame!
Discover a destination that is unparalleled, and perfectly blended with the personalization you need to always feel right at home.
Our apartments truly bring you to the hub of work and play in Hollywood, CA.
Experience better living in a community that includes the ideal arrangement of amenities that will enhance your day-to-day routine.
We offer one-, two-, and three-bedroom floor plans that are complete with stainless steel appliances and quality amenities.
Our pet-friendly apartments give you plenty of space to call your own.
Designed with the luxury services you deserve, our community is centered on creating the lifestyle that you have been waiting for.
Come home to Hollywood View Towers Luxury Apartments, where you have the entire world at your fingertips.
Pet Policy
$500 pet deposit per pet; 2 pet max.

2.5 times rent

Located on the South Side of Hollywood Blvd.
Between Van Ness & Wilton Place.
